fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a living player to Commemorate. This lasts until they die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When a Commemorated target dies, they may give two players a Bouquet.
- Boquets will unleash their curse when the holder is visited by an evil player. The holder and all visitors are roleblocked. This consumes the Bouquet.
- The Bouquet cannot scare attackers that have powerful attacks or stronger.
- After a player has been scared by a Bouquet, they will no longer fear it. In the future, they will no longer be roleblocked by Bouquets (but can still trigger them, if they're evil).

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - You start the game with a Wilting Bouquet - when you are visited by an evil player, you and all your visitors will be roleblocked. This cannot scare attackers with powerful attacks or stronger. Your Bouquet wilts at the end of night 3.
